title: How to Throw a Graduation Party on a Budget (with Pictures)
excerpt: How to Throw a Graduation Party on a Budget. Graduation parties are a great way to commemorate the years of hard work teens and college co-eds devote to education. Theyâ€™re also costly for mom and dad.The average cost of a graduation party in 2013 was a whopping $1,200, according to Graduationparty.com; $700 of that was allocated for food....
